typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as integer,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as integer,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer') ~> employee
employee keyGenerate(output({employee num} as long),
	startAt: 111L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['emp_surgate.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		{employee number} = {employee num},
		ENAME,
		JOB,
		MGR,
		HIREDATE,
		SAL,
		COMM,
		DEPTNO,
		EMPNO
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
